Default.Description: Sets the default index to be selected if enter or escape key is pressed.
Default.Name: Default

Gray Background.Description: Specifies if background screen needs to be grayed.
Gray Background.Name: Gray Background

Horizontal Align.Description: Specifies the horizontal alignment of the querybox on screen.

Parameters.Keywords: Bottom, Center, Centre, Justified, Left, Prompt, Right, Top

Horizontal Align.Name: Horizontal Align

Query.Description: Lists the query message and key.
Query.Name: Query

Title.Description: It displays the messsage for the querybox in the corner.
Title.Name: Title

Vertical Align.Description: Specifies the vertical alignment of the query box on screen. The alignment of the form across the height of the page is set by this attribute.

Parameters.Keywords: Bottom, Center, Centre, Justified, Left, Prompt, Right, Top

Vertical Align.Name: Vertical Align
